item.title: Zero to Om - Act 5
item.description: In this part we will have a closer look at the app’s build configuration and discover what it can do for us. The source code can be found on GitHub. Note: I strongly recommend reading the previous post first if you haven’t done so already. The Build Config The project’s build configuration is defined in project.clj. It is written in Clojure and looks like this: ;; project.clj, part 1 (defproject todomvc "0.
